text: Hello everyone! I need your help (thanks in advance) I have to implement a 5 stars rating system in a blog in HubSpot, does someone have any advice or documentation that could help me? Thanks for the attention! :grinning:

Hello. It’s an old topic, building a module with line_item.price. I have Line Items in USD, the company Currency is EUR. That “line_item.price” gives me EUR. Is there a trick in the meanwhile? Thx, Thomas.
